content:
Hi,
i just checked your documentation about RDF, but what i understand is that its only possible to export the fhir ressources into a rdf structure ?
Does the other way work aswell? Parsing a RDF File and represente the data on a fhir-server?

I'm not entirely sure what you are asking. If you are asking about the RDF syntax defined in the spec, servers are able to read and write that. Except that I don't think anyone has actually implemented that - it's on my list for the Madrid connectathon
if you mean, can servers read or write arbitary RDF... no
I haven't seen an RDF importer, but we have an OWL->CodeSystem importer that we use with Ontoserver (its a separate tool, not part of Ontoserver)
